mapper.insert: insert into plans (user_id, title, location, start_date, end_date, img) values (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{location}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{img})
mapper.select: select p.plan_id, p.title, p.location, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.img, tp.plan_place_id, tp.visit_date, tp.visit_time, tp.place_name, tp.description from plans p left join plan_places tp ON p.plan_id = tp.plan_id where p.user_id = #{user_id} AND p.plan_id = #{plan_id} order by tp.visit_date, tp.visit_time;
mapper.insert: insert into plan_places(plan_id, visit_date, visit_time, place_name, description) values(#{plan_id}, #{visit_date}, #{visit_time}, #{place_name}, #{description});
insert into plan_places (plan_id, visit_date, visit_time, place_name, description) values (#{plan_id}, #{visit_date}, #{visit_time}, #{place_name}, #{description});
